英文公告.標案名稱: National Freeway Bridge Seismic Retrofitting Project (2nd stage) M31 Bid
英文公告.廠商地址: 9F., No.20, Guanqian Rd., Zhongzheng Dist., Taipei City 100, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: Project title: National Freeway Bridge Seismic Retrofitting Project(2nd)stage M31 BidScope of work Construction:Contract consists of 69 main-line, overpass bridges and ramps ranging from Xizhi System Interchange to the south side of Ankeng stream bridge(10 k+300~32k+600) on the National Freeway No.3 and the ramps of Nangang System Interchange on the National Freeway No.5.The major tasks are as follows:Foundation Retrofit, Steel Jacketing, Concrete Jacketing, Pier Caps Retrofit, Abutments Retrofit, Concrete Shear Blocks, Steel Shear keys, Loss Prevention Device, Restrainers Installation and replacement ,and so on.Others:Please check the bid documents.
